alert.note: Alert for Tioga (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 3:46PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL TIOGA COUNTY THROUGH 430 PM EDT... At 345 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wellsboro, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Wellsboro, Blossburg, Lawrenceville, Covington, Arnot, Millerton, Keeneyville, Tioga, Roseville, Tioga Junction and Mansfield University. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for north central Pennsylvania.
